name: Slingshot Apocalypse
description:
Engine Override presents: Slingshot Apocalypse

After you’ve invaded the spaceship of the unknown alien species “The Wam’plei”, they’ve discovered you and are now trying to destroy you. You quickly start your own rocket and fly away. You use slingshots to move from planet to planet and try to shake off the big evil spaceship. Be fast as they won’t stop chasing you. Are you able to stay out of the hands of the enemies for as long as possible?

This is just the first version of Slingshot Apocalypse with a lot more coming your way including:

- Multiple enemies who will thwart you

- More fancy art

- And much more…

A simple but funny game where you need to tap on your screen to leave the orbit of a planet. Over time it will speed up and get harder to time your slingshot right. Challenge your friends and get the highest score of them all.

So start playing and stay tuned, updates are coming!
